get.description: This API lists the time entries associated with a task.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

schema.description: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

parameters.name: createdTimeRange
parameters.description: Key that filters time entries created in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, createdTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

schema.description: Key that filters time entries created in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, createdTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of time entries to fetch

schema.description: Number of time entries to fetch

parameters.name: isInvoiced
parameters.description: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

schema.description: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the time entries in ascending or descending order, based on the @executedTime@ attribute. Values allowed are @ASC@ (default) and @DESC@.

schema.description: Key that sorts the time entries in ascending or descending order, based on the @executedTime@ attribute. Values allowed are @ASC@ (default) and @DESC@.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Index number, starting from which the time entries must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the time entries must be fetched

parameters.name: modifiedTimeRange
parameters.description: Key that filters time entries whose details were modified in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, modifiedTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

schema.description: Key that filters time entries whose details were modified in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, modifiedTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

parameters.name: isBillable
parameters.description: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

schema.description: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

post.description: This API creates a time entry in your help desk

get.summary: Get summation of Task Time Entries
get.description: This API fetches the sum of time entries associated with a task.

parameters.name: isInvoiced
parameters.description: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

schema.description: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

parameters.name: isBillable
parameters.description: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

schema.description: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

get.description: This API fetches a time entry recorded for a task.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

schema.description: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

patch.description: This API updates details of an existing time entry.

include.descrption: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

createdTimeRange.descrption: Key that filters time entries created in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, createdTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

isInvoiced.descrption: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

limit.descrption: Number of time entries to fetch

billStatus.descrption: Key that filters time entries, based on their billing status: @nonBillable@ , @billable@ or @billed@

orderBy.descrption: Key that sorts the time entries in ascending or descending order, based on the @executedTime@ attribute. Values allowed are @ASC@ (default) and @DESC@.

from.descrption: Index number, starting from which the time entries must be fetched

modifiedTimeRange.descrption: Key that filters time entries whose details were modified in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, modifiedTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

isBillable.descrption: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

include.descrption: Secondary information related to the time entry. Value supported is @owner@.

createdTimeRange.descrption: Key that filters time entries created in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, createdTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

limit.descrption: Number of time entries to fetch

billStatus.descrption: Key that filters time entries, based on their billing status: @nonBillable@ , @billable@ or @billed@

orderBy.descrption: Key that sorts the time entries in ascending or descending order, based on the @executedTime@ attribute. Values allowed are @ASC@ (default) and @DESC@.

from.descrption: Index number, starting from which the time entries must be fetched

modifiedTimeRange.descrption: Key that filters time entries whose details were modified in a particular period of time. Enter the from and to dates in the ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ; for example, modifiedTimeRange=2017-11-05T00:00:00.000Z,2018-09-05T23:59:00.000Z.

isBillable.descrption: Key that returns if the time tracked is billable or not.

User who created the time entry.

isInvoiced.description: Filter to get invoiced or not invoiced time entries

secondsSpent.description: Number of seconds in the time entry.

executedTime.description: Time when work related to the time entry was started.

minutesSpent.description: Number of minutes in the time entry.

agentCostPerHour.description: Per hour cost of an agent.

hoursSpent.description: Number of hours in the time entry.

ownerId.description: ID of the user associated with the time entry

mode.description: Mode configured in time tracking. Supported values are @Manual@ and @Auto@

requestChargeType.description: Type of request in the ticket. Values supported are Customer Service, Upgrade Request, Product Consultation, and Support and Maintenance.
